attributes.action: Government Step down or start to help.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK has gone to the dogs. Leading this country is a group of rich kids who have no idea about the people they govern and they have lost touch completely.
They say there helping but they are hurting this country more than they realise.
Tax, Tax and more Tax and then give the rich folks a tax break. Tax fuel to the hilt while they claim all there fuel as an expense. New food taxes and then more tax and tax rises.
When will it end.
Time to let them hear our voice.
